channel.title: NUlls ... =\ help?

im guys i opend up my playerhandler.class and uhh i got all this.. i heard u fix nulls here but uhmm what do i do???

item.title: NUlls ... =\ help?
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

This is a serious answer: Look up a gibberish translator. I’m not sure what exact form of core dump (computer gibberish) it is, but look up a translator, its the least you can do.

Read full topic

item.title: NUlls ... =\ help?
item.dc:creator: @Purpl3_Elf Purpl3 Elf
item.description:
@Purpl3_Elf wrote:

im guys i opend up my playerhandler.class and uhh i got all this… i heard u fix nulls here but uhmm what do i do???
